DESCRIPTION: If Apostasy reaches 10 inflicted creatures lose 5 strength and gain 99 weak. If the Heretic reaches 10 Apostasy, he gains 5 strength.
Target takes #b10% of all damage that they deal out.
Cursed creatures lose HP when you draw a card.
Cursed creatures take damage equal to their apostasy at the end of each turn.
Make sure the first element in NAMES has no underscores. The rest should use _ in the place of spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.
